creator: Shyft Technologies Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Shift swapping, scheduling, and team messaging has never been easier. Teams enjoy using Shyft because it is designed to be effortless and natural. Shyft is the only team app you need for shift work management.
The Shyft app is easy to use so your team can start swapping right away. Simply join your business location in the app and invite your team. Managers get additional features to manage their location.

App Features
- Shift Feed - get shifts covered and pick up shifts.
- Shift Calendar - keep your work schedule at your fingertips
- Schedule Sharing - Share the schedule with team in seconds
- Team Feed - communicate with your team via group or direct messages
- Availability - Submit your availability directly to your manager.
- Settings, filters, and controls.

Managers Features
- Approve/Deny shift swaps
- Collect team availability
- Manage Team/Roster
- Web Dashboard
- Record keeping*
- Regional schedule compliance*
- Team stats, reporting, and analytics*
- Control Location Privacy*
- Turn off Tipping Feature*
- Delete User Content*

*included with Shyft Pro subscription

We offer the Shyft Pro subscription on a monthly, semi-annual or annual basis which allows managers to control shift approval, location privacy, tipping, content deletion and other administrative features. It is not required to get started with Shyft.

Also - we want to hear from you! We are constantly working to improve the app so reach out with comments by sending an email to support@myshyft.com.
descriptionShort: Shift swapping, scheduling, and team messaging made easy for shift teams

title: Shyft - Shift Swap, Schedule, Team Messaging

creator: Shyft Technologies Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Shyft empowers employees to swap their shifts, message team members, and manage schedules, all from their mobile device. Every day, users rely on Shyft to help make real time adjustments to their work schedule and stay connected with their team.

Whether you need one important shift covered, or you are looking to broadcast thousands of shifts, Shyft is here to help.

VIEW YOUR WORK SCHEDULE
Access and manage your work schedule on your mobile device. View shifts you are working, all shift details, and get push notification reminders before each shift.

FIND COVERAGE FOR YOUR SHIFT
Can’t make it to work? No problem! Post your shift on the Shift Marketplace and find coverage from another team member. Once a manager approves, you are off the hook!

PICK UP EXTRA WORK SHIFTS
Looking to earn extra income? Pick up shifts by browsing available work opportunities on the Shift Marketplace. Tap on a shift to apply. Once you are approved, head in to work!

COMMUNICATE WITH YOU TEAM
Stay connected without trading phone numbers with your coworkers. Access the Community tab to send direct messages or post multimedia on team channels.

REQUEST TIME OFF
Make time off requests for days you need off in your calendar. View accrual balances, and submit the request for managers to approve.

TAKE VOLUNTARY TIME OFF
When VTO opportunities are made available, tap to apply and offer to take the day off. Once approved, enjoy your day off!

ADMIN FEATURES:

POST OPEN SHIFTS
Broadcast 1 or 100s of open shifts with the tap of a button. If you need team members to work, post a shift, add a description, and select the group. Then manage applications as they come in.

APPROVE AND DENY SHIFTS
Review and approve or deny shift swap applications between team members, and for manager posted shifts. Manage multiple applications all on one shift card.

VIEW TEAM ROSTERS
Manage the daily roster and see which employees are working when. View job positions and shift start/end times. Add Open Shifts and VTOs directly from the roster card.

POST ANNOUNCEMENTS
Post announcements with read receipts. Send announcements to your location on a team channel, and see who has marked the announcement as read.

SHARE PHOTO SCHEDULES
Still using paper scheduling? Take a photo of a printed schedule to send to your team. Team members will be able to view the schedule in their shift calendar.

MANAGE USERS & GROUPS
View all location team members and approve or deny users into the location. Create new groups for shift posting and communication channels to send messages.

Have a question? Tap Send Feedback in the app or visit support.myshyft.com.
descriptionShort: Shift swapping, scheduling, and team messaging made easy for shift teams

Happy Shyfting!

title: Shyft - Shift Swap, Schedule, Team Messaging

creator: Shyft Technologies Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Shyft empowers employees to swap their shifts, message team members, and manage schedules, all from their mobile device. Every day, users rely on Shyft to help make real time adjustments to their work schedule and stay connected with their team.

Whether you need one important shift covered, or you are looking to broadcast thousands of shifts, Shyft is here to help.

VIEW YOUR WORK SCHEDULE
Access and manage your work schedule on your mobile device. View shifts you are working, all shift details, and get push notification reminders before each shift.

FIND COVERAGE FOR YOUR SHIFT
Can’t make it to work? No problem! Post your shift on the Shift Marketplace and find coverage from another team member. Once a manager approves, you are off the hook!

PICK UP EXTRA WORK SHIFTS
Looking to earn extra income? Pick up shifts by browsing available work opportunities on the Shift Marketplace. Tap on a shift to apply. Once you are approved, head in to work!

COMMUNICATE WITH YOU TEAM
Stay connected without trading phone numbers with your coworkers. Access the Community tab to send direct messages or post multimedia on team channels.

REQUEST TIME OFF
Make time off requests for days you need off in your calendar. View accrual balances, and submit the request for managers to approve.

TAKE VOLUNTARY TIME OFF
When VTO opportunities are made available, tap to apply and offer to take the day off. Once approved, enjoy your day off!

ADMIN FEATURES:

POST OPEN SHIFTS
Broadcast 1 or 100s of open shifts with the tap of a button. If you need team members to work, post a shift, add a description, and select the group. Then manage applications as they come in.

APPROVE AND DENY SHIFTS
Review and approve or deny shift swap applications between team members, and for manager posted shifts. Manage multiple applications all on one shift card.

VIEW TEAM ROSTERS
Manage the daily roster and see which employees are working when. View job positions and shift start/end times. Add Open Shifts and VTOs directly from the roster card.

POST ANNOUNCEMENTS
Post announcements with read receipts. Send announcements to your location on a team channel, and see who has marked the announcement as read.

SHARE PHOTO SCHEDULES
Still using paper scheduling? Take a photo of a printed schedule to send to your team. Team members will be able to view the schedule in their shift calendar.

MANAGE USERS & GROUPS
View all location team members and approve or deny users into the location. Create new groups for shift posting and communication channels to send messages.

Have a question? Tap Send Feedback in the app or visit support.myshyft.com.

Shyft empowers employees to swap their shifts, message team members, and manage schedules, all from their mobile device. Every day, users rely on Shyft to help make real time adjustments to their work schedule and stay connected with their team.

Whether you need one important shift covered, or you are looking to broadcast thousands of shifts, Shyft is here to help.

VIEW YOUR WORK SCHEDULE
Access and manage your work schedule on your mobile device. View shifts you are working, all shift details, and get push notification reminders before each shift.

FIND COVERAGE FOR YOUR SHIFT
Can’t make it to work? No problem! Post your shift on the Shift Marketplace and find coverage from another team member. Once a manager approves, you are off the hook!

PICK UP EXTRA WORK SHIFTS
Looking to earn extra income? Pick up shifts by browsing available work opportunities on the Shift Marketplace. Tap on a shift to apply. Once you are approved, head in to work!

COMMUNICATE WITH YOU TEAM
Stay connected without trading phone numbers with your coworkers. Access the Community tab to send direct messages or post multimedia on team channels.

REQUEST TIME OFF
Make time off requests for days you need off in your calendar. View accrual balances, and submit the request for managers to approve.

TAKE VOLUNTARY TIME OFF
When VTO opportunities are made available, tap to apply and offer to take the day off. Once approved, enjoy your day off!

ADMIN FEATURES:

POST OPEN SHIFTS
Broadcast 1 or 100s of open shifts with the tap of a button. If you need team members to work, post a shift, add a description, and select the group. Then manage applications as they come in.

APPROVE AND DENY SHIFTS
Review and approve or deny shift swap applications between team members, and for manager posted shifts. Manage multiple applications all on one shift card.

VIEW TEAM ROSTERS
Manage the daily roster and see which employees are working when. View job positions and shift start/end times. Add Open Shifts and VTOs directly from the roster card.

POST ANNOUNCEMENTS
Post announcements with read receipts. Send announcements to your location on a team channel, and see who has marked the announcement as read.

SHARE PHOTO SCHEDULES
Still using paper scheduling? Take a photo of a printed schedule to send to your team. Team members will be able to view the schedule in their shift calendar.

MANAGE USERS & GROUPS
View all location team members and approve or deny users into the location. Create new groups for shift posting and communication channels to send messages.

Have a question? Tap Send Feedback in the app or visit support.myshyft.com.
descriptionShort: Shift swapping, scheduling, and team messaging made easy for shift teams

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New features are available in this release:
-Display Month picker when loading calendar feed
-Week picker date now synchronized with shift card date selection
-Admin view of multiple applicants open on launching shift details view

Bug fixes and feature enhancements in this release:
-Minor bug fixes

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps keep Shyft running.
Have a question? Tap Send Feedback in the app or visit support.myshyft.com

Access and manage your work schedule on your mobile device. View shifts you are working, all shift details, and get push notification reminders before each shift.

FIND COVERAGE FOR YOUR SHIFT
Can’t make it to work? No problem! Post your shift on the Shift Marketplace and find coverage from another team member. Once a manager approves, you are off the hook!

PICK UP EXTRA WORK SHIFTS
Looking to earn extra income? Pick up shifts by browsing available work opportunities on the Shift Marketplace. Tap on a shift to apply. Once you are approved, head in to work!

COMMUNICATE WITH YOU TEAM
Stay connected without trading phone numbers with your coworkers. Access the Community tab to send direct messages or post multimedia on team channels.

REQUEST TIME OFF
Make time off requests for days you need off in your calendar. View accrual balances, and submit the request for managers to approve.

TAKE VOLUNTARY TIME OFF
When VTO opportunities are made available, tap to apply and offer to take the day off. Once approved, enjoy your day off!

ADMIN FEATURES:

POST OPEN SHIFTS
Broadcast 1 or 100s of open shifts with the tap of a button. If you need team members to work, post a shift, add a description, and select the group. Then manage applications as they come in.

APPROVE AND DENY SHIFTS
Review and approve or deny shift swap applications between team members, and for manager posted shifts. Manage multiple applications all on one shift card.

VIEW TEAM ROSTERS
Manage the daily roster and see which employees are working when. View job positions and shift start/end times. Add Open Shifts and VTOs directly from the roster card.

POST ANNOUNCEMENTS
Post announcements with read receipts. Send announcements to your location on a team channel, and see who has marked the announcement as read.

SHARE PHOTO SCHEDULES
Still using paper scheduling? Take a photo of a printed schedule to send to your team. Team members will be able to view the schedule in their shift calendar.

MANAGE USERS & GROUPS
View all location team members and approve or deny users into the location. Create new groups for shift posting and communication channels to send messages.

Have a question? Tap Send Feedback in the app or visit support.myshyft.com.
descriptionShort: Shift swapping, scheduling, and team messaging made easy for shift teams

Broadcast 1 or 100s of open shifts with the tap of a button. If you need team members to work, post a shift, add a description, and select the group. Then manage applications as they come in.

APPROVE AND DENY SHIFTS
Review and approve or deny shift swap applications between team members, and for manager posted shifts. Manage multiple applications all on one shift card.

VIEW TEAM ROSTERS
Manage the daily roster and see which employees are working when. View job positions and shift start/end times. Add Open Shifts and VTOs directly from the roster card.

POST ANNOUNCEMENTS
Post announcements with read receipts. Send announcements to your location on a team channel, and see who has marked the announcement as read.

SHARE PHOTO SCHEDULES
Still using paper scheduling? Take a photo of a printed schedule to send to your team. Team members will be able to view the schedule in their shift calendar.

MANAGE USERS & GROUPS
View all location team members and approve or deny users into the location. Create new groups for shift posting and communication channels to send messages.

Have a question? Tap Send Feedback in the app or visit support.myshyft.com.
descriptionShort: Shift swapping, scheduling, and team messaging made easy for shift teams

title: Shyft - Shift Swap, Schedule, Team Messaging

creator: Shyft Technologies Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Shyft empowers employees to swap their shifts, message team members, and manage schedules, all from their mobile device. Every day, users rely on Shyft to help make real time adjustments to their work schedule and stay connected with their team.

Whether you need one important shift covered, or you are looking to broadcast thousands of shifts, Shyft is here to help.

VIEW YOUR WORK SCHEDULE
Access and manage your work schedule on your mobile device. View shifts you are working, all shift details, and get push notification reminders before each shift.

FIND COVERAGE FOR YOUR SHIFT
Can’t make it to work? No problem! Post your shift on the Shift Marketplace and find coverage from another team member. Once a manager approves, you are off the hook!

PICK UP EXTRA WORK SHIFTS
Looking to earn extra income? Pick up shifts by browsing available work opportunities on the Shift Marketplace. Tap on a shift to apply. Once you are approved, head in to work!

COMMUNICATE WITH YOU TEAM
Stay connected without trading phone numbers with your coworkers. Access the Community tab to send direct messages or post multimedia on team channels.

REQUEST TIME OFF
Make time off requests for days you need off in your calendar. View accrual balances, and submit the request for managers to approve.

TAKE VOLUNTARY TIME OFF
When VTO opportunities are made available, tap to apply and offer to take the day off. Once approved, enjoy your day off!

ADMIN FEATURES:

POST OPEN SHIFTS
Broadcast 1 or 100s of open shifts with the tap of a button. If you need team members to work, post a shift, add a description, and select the group. Then manage applications as they come in.

APPROVE AND DENY SHIFTS
Review and approve or deny shift swap applications between team members, and for manager posted shifts. Manage multiple applications all on one shift card.

VIEW TEAM ROSTERS
Manage the daily roster and see which employees are working when. View job positions and shift start/end times. Add Open Shifts and VTOs directly from the roster card.

POST ANNOUNCEMENTS
Post announcements with read receipts. Send announcements to your location on a team channel, and see who has marked the announcement as read.

SHARE PHOTO SCHEDULES
Still using paper scheduling? Take a photo of a printed schedule to send to your team. Team members will be able to view the schedule in their shift calendar.

MANAGE USERS & GROUPS
View all location team members and approve or deny users into the location. Create new groups for shift posting and communication channels to send messages.

Have a question? Tap Send Feedback in the app or visit support.myshyft.com.
descriptionShort: Shift swapping, scheduling, and team messaging made easy for shift teams

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- Fixed time display issues in the Shift Feed.
- Fixed issue when updating group member counts after user leaves.
- Other minor bug fixes.

Have a question? Tap Send Feedback in the app or visit support.myshyft.com"

Stay connected without trading phone numbers with your coworkers. Access the Community tab to send direct messages or post multimedia on team channels.

REQUEST TIME OFF
Make time off requests for days you need off in your calendar. View accrual balances, and submit the request for managers to approve.

TAKE VOLUNTARY TIME OFF
When VTO opportunities are made available, tap to apply and offer to take the day off. Once approved, enjoy your day off!

ADMIN FEATURES:

POST OPEN SHIFTS
Broadcast 1 or 100s of open shifts with the tap of a button. If you need team members to work, post a shift, add a description, and select the group. Then manage applications as they come in.

APPROVE AND DENY SHIFTS
Review and approve or deny shift swap applications between team members, and for manager posted shifts. Manage multiple applications all on one shift card.

VIEW TEAM ROSTERS
Manage the daily roster and see which employees are working when. View job positions and shift start/end times. Add Open Shifts and VTOs directly from the roster card.

POST ANNOUNCEMENTS
Post announcements with read receipts. Send announcements to your location on a team channel, and see who has marked the announcement as read.

SHARE PHOTO SCHEDULES
Still using paper scheduling? Take a photo of a printed schedule to send to your team. Team members will be able to view the schedule in their shift calendar.

MANAGE USERS & GROUPS
View all location team members and approve or deny users into the location. Create new groups for shift posting and communication channels to send messages.

Have a question? Tap Send Feedback in the app or visit support.myshyft.com.

title: Shyft - Shift Swap, Schedule,

creator: Shyft Technologies Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Shyft empowers employees to swap their shifts, message team members, and manage schedules, all from their mobile device. Every day, users rely on Shyft to help make real time adjustments to their work schedule and stay connected with their team.

Whether you need one important shift covered, or you are looking to broadcast thousands of shifts, Shyft is here to help.

VIEW YOUR WORK SCHEDULE
Access and manage your work schedule on your mobile device. View shifts you are working, all shift details, and get push notification reminders before each shift.

FIND COVERAGE FOR YOUR SHIFT
Can’t make it to work? No problem! Post your shift on the Shift Marketplace and find coverage from another team member. Once a manager approves, you are off the hook!

PICK UP EXTRA WORK SHIFTS
Looking to earn extra income? Pick up shifts by browsing available work opportunities on the Shift Marketplace. Tap on a shift to apply. Once you are approved, head in to work!

COMMUNICATE WITH YOU TEAM
Stay connected without trading phone numbers with your coworkers. Access the Community tab to send direct messages or post multimedia on team channels.

REQUEST TIME OFF
Make time off requests for days you need off in your calendar. View accrual balances, and submit the request for managers to approve.

TAKE VOLUNTARY TIME OFF
When VTO opportunities are made available, tap to apply and offer to take the day off. Once approved, enjoy your day off!

ADMIN FEATURES:

POST OPEN SHIFTS
Broadcast 1 or 100s of open shifts with the tap of a button. If you need team members to work, post a shift, add a description, and select the group. Then manage applications as they come in.

APPROVE AND DENY SHIFTS
Review and approve or deny shift swap applications between team members, and for manager posted shifts. Manage multiple applications all on one shift card.

VIEW TEAM ROSTERS
Manage the daily roster and see which employees are working when. View job positions and shift start/end times. Add Open Shifts and VTOs directly from the roster card.

POST ANNOUNCEMENTS

COMMUNICATE WITH YOU TEAM
Stay connected without trading phone numbers with your coworkers. Access the Community tab to send direct messages or post multimedia on team channels.

REQUEST TIME OFF
Make time off requests for days you need off in your calendar. View accrual balances, and submit the request for managers to approve.

TAKE VOLUNTARY TIME OFF
When VTO opportunities are made available, tap to apply and offer to take the day off. Once approved, enjoy your day off!

ADMIN FEATURES:

POST OPEN SHIFTS
Broadcast 1 or 100s of open shifts with the tap of a button. If you need team members to work, post a shift, add a description, and select the group. Then manage applications as they come in.

APPROVE AND DENY SHIFTS
Review and approve or deny shift swap applications between team members, and for manager posted shifts. Manage multiple applications all on one shift card.

VIEW TEAM ROSTERS
Manage the daily roster and see which employees are working when. View job positions and shift start/end times. Add Open Shifts and VTOs directly from the roster card.

POST ANNOUNCEMENTS
Post announcements with read receipts. Send announcements to your location on a team channel, and see who has marked the announcement as read.

SHARE PHOTO SCHEDULES

MANAGE USERS & GROUPS
View all location team members and approve or deny users into the location. Create new groups for shift posting and communication channels to send messages.
